name: you are born, sorry about that
name_original: you are born, sorry about that
description:
IMPORTANT NOTES: This game is UNFINISHED, and currently ends in the Red Room with no conclusion or further narrative stuff. I recommend you play in WINDOWED MODE, because the game doesn't currently have an escape or exit menu. Sorry about that!
  • This game was made for Ink Jam 18, and I only managed to get 2/3 of the acts completed. I plan to finish the game properly and give it a small commercial release.
  • The game was made in Unity using the Ink integration.
  • This is a game by me, Josh Ling. You can follow me on Twitter: twitter.com/tactful
